title: Configure PostgreSQL high availability replication

objective: Restrict client networks and authentication methods per security policy.

title: Enable PostgreSQL workload observability
objective: Capture query performance metrics and slow query diagnostics.

title: Configure PostgreSQL resource governance
objective: Apply connection limits and statement timeouts to prevent resource exhaustion.

title: Implement PostgreSQL row-level security policies
objective: Enforce tenant data isolation through database-level access controls.

objective: Schedule vacuum, analyze, and index maintenance for query performance.

title: Audit PostgreSQL privileged access assignments
